'''Ghillie Masks''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|the character in {{XC3FR|sub}}|Ghondor (FR)}} {{spoiler}} {{Infobox Character |name = Ghondor |image = XC3 Ghondor Portrait Art.png |species = [[City|Citizen]] |age = 18 |gender = Female |haircolor = Brown |eyecolor = Green |affiliation = [[Lost Numbers]] |voiceactorjp = [[Wikipedia:Satomi Akesaka|Satomi Akesaka]] |voiceactoreng= [[Wikipedia:Dominique Moore|Dominique Moore]] |appearances = {{XC3}}
{{XC3FR|sublink}} (flashback) }} '''Ghondor Vandham''' (Japanese: ゴンドウ・ヴァンダム, ''Gondō Vandamu'') is a character in {{XC3}}. == Overview == She is the daughter of [[Monica Vandham|Monica]] and the granddaughter of [[Guernica Vandham]]. She is small but has a great sense of combat and fights with her fists. She is a very brave person who is never intimidated by huge [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] and never loses. While her cynicism and brutal honesty make it difficult for her to get along with others, especially her mother (who she refers to as "Bitchqueen"), she does genuinely care for her friends and family despite trying to act harshly towards them. She is one of the six [[Ouroboros]] candidates, alongside [[Jansen]], [[Olive]], [[Kryto]], [[Cyma]], and [[Nissick]], and is accompanied by her guards [[Aggy]] and [[Oggy]] at all times, who call her "{{lang|jp|お嬢}}", "''Ojō''". https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1542403497605603328 She is recruited as a [[Hero]] shortly after starting [[Chapter 6 (XC3)|Chapter 6]]. Her [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]] can be increased to 20 by completing the [[Hero Quest|Ascension Quest]], ''[[Knowing Your Family]]''. {{clr}} == Gameplay == Ghondor fights as a [[Martial Artist]], an [[Agnus|Agnian]] [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]]. === Arts === * '''[[Raging Force]]''', Damage increases for every art not used up. (Talent Art) * [[Detonating Hit]], Side [[Daze (XC3)|Daze]] * [[Hyper Dropkick]], Blowdown / Front Attack Up * [[Comet Punch (XC3)|Comet Punch]], AOE / High Critical Rate & Evade Attacks * [[Focus]], Stance / Art Recharge Up & Auto Attack Speed Up * [[Rampaging Fists]], Increased damage by 50% for every enemy in battle, to a max of 200% Ghondor's [[Chain Attack (XC3)|Chain Art]] is [[Avalanche Onslaught (XC3)|Avalanche Onslaught]], and her Heroic Chain bonus makes her always reactivate in addition to the usual reactivations based on the prior Chain Order's results. === Base Stats === These are Ghondor's raw stats prior to modifications by class. They serve as a baseline for calculating her stats in the Martial Artist class (see its page for the corresponding multipliers which adjust these stats). Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between these base stats. {| class="xc1 centered" width="80%" ! Level !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility |- | 1 || 407 || 23 || 20 || 32 || 23 |- | 99 || 6,779 || 384 || 341 || 323 || 234 |} === General Stats === These stats assume Ghondor is at rank 20 in her class. Stat increases from gems are shown separately from the base stat, and may not fully apply if Ghondor has not unlocked the corresponding gem slots. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" !Level!!HP !Attack !Healing Power!!Dexterity!!Agility!!Critical Rate!!Block Rate !!Physical Defense!!Ether Defense |- |1, base||305 ||43 (+20)||5||38||27||24%||8%||15%||15% |- |99, base||5,084||976 (+70)||85||387||280 ||36%||16%||15%||15% |- |99, with default accessories||5,084||1,171 (+70)||85 || 387||280||36%||16%||15%||15% |} Ghondor equips the following gems: * [[Steady Striker]] * [[Empowered Combo]], at level 20 onwards * [[Steelcleaver]], at level 40 onwards Ghondor equips the following accessories as her default accessories, which can be changed in post-game or [[New Game + (XC3)|New Game+]]. All equipped accessories assume their Common variant. * [[Steam Belt (XC3)|Steam Belt]] * [[Power Bangle]], at level 30 onwards * [[Storm Necklace]], at level 50 onwards {{clr}} == Affinity Links == {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Ghondor | npc2 = Monica Vandham | affinity = pink | caption = Family | direction = both }} {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Ghondor | npc2 = Shania | affinity = green | caption = Be true to yourself | direction = right }} {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Ghondor | npc2 = Aggy | affinity = pink | caption = M'lady! | direction = left }} {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Ghondor | npc2 = Dana (XC3) | affinity = pink | caption = She was a good friend | direction = right }} {{XC3 Affinity Link | npc1 = Ghondor | npc2 = Seeker | affinity = pink | caption = Treading the same path | direction = both }} == Battle == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Ghondor |image = XC3 Ghondor Battle.jpg |caption = Ghondor |category = [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |type = [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] |level = 47 |area = [[Li Garte Prison Camp]] ([[Central Cell]]) |spawntime = Story |respawn = No |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} '''Ghondor''' is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. She is a [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] soldier fought at level 47 in the [[Central Cell]] in [[Li Garte Prison Camp]]. Story progression will occur regardless of the outcome of the battle. {{clr}} === Challenge Battle Mode === {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Wrathfist Ghondor |image = |caption = Wrathfist Ghondor |type = [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Boss]] |level = 115 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Heroes Frontline]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 3,493,800 |strength = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} '''Wrathfist Ghondor''' is fought at level 115 during the second wave of the [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] ''[[Heroes Frontline]]''. {{clr}} == Etymology == Her Japanese title {{lang|jp|お嬢}}, ''Ojō'', usually means "(someone else's) daughter" in an honorific or respectful sense. == Trivia == * Ghondor shares notable similarities to [[w:c:xenosaga:Rico|Rico]] from ''[[w:c:xenosaga:Xenogears|Xenogears]]'', a character in charge of prisoners of a [[w:c:xenosaga:Nortune|capital city]] with his own bodyguards. Both ended up being betrayed by a [[w:c:xenosaga:Hammer (Xenogears)|close friend]] along with the party. * She shares a first name with her [[Ghondor (FR)|ancestor]], likely being named after him. * She and Monica are the only Heroes who cannot directly join the party in the trek through Origin. == Gallery == === Artwork === XC3 Ghondor Artwork.png|Official Artwork XC3 Ojo artwork.jpg Ghondor Concept Art.png|Ghondor's Concept Art Aggy Oggy Ghondor Concept.png|Ghondor, Aggy, and Oggy Concept art === In-Game Renders === Ghondor Hero Icon.png|Hero List Icon Ghondor Chain Art Icon.png|Chain Art Icon Ghondor Level Up Art.png|Level Up Art Icon chara 23.png Icon chara battle 24.png === Screenshots === Consul S vs Ghondo.jpg|Ghondor fighting against Shania == References == {{XC3CharNav}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Heroes]] [[Category:Ghondor]] [[Category:Lost Numbers]] [[Category:Agnus Castle Region NPCs]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Lost Numbers Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 46-50 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:Pages needing plot info]]

{{for|the character in {{XC3|-}}|Ghondor}} {{spoiler}} {{Infobox Character |name = Ghondor |image = XC3:FR= [[File:Ghondor FR.png]] |-| XC3= [[File:Young Ghondor.jpg]] |species = [[City|Citizen]] |age = Unknown |gender = Male |haircolor = Black (Young age)
White (Old age) |eyecolor = Blue |affiliation = [[City]] |voiceactorjp = Satoshi Shimada |voiceactoreng = Matthew Marsh |appearances = {{XC3}} (flashback)
{{XC3FR|sublink}} }} '''Ghondor''' (Japanese: ゴンドウ, ''Gondō'') is a character in {{XC3FR}}. {{clr}} == Overview == [[File:ghond_babby.png|thumb|210px|Ghondor as a newborn.]] Ghondor is the son of the incarnations of [[N|Noah]] and [[M|Mio]] who eventually became [[Consul]]s N and M, respectively, and is the grandfather of [[Matthew (FR)|Matthew]] and [[Na'el]], whom he raised. He was a master of martial arts and passed on his mastery to both of his grandchildren. He played an important role in the foundation of the [[City]] and was trusted by everyone. == Appearance == In {{XC3|-}}, Ghondor is only shown as an infant and a small child. He strongly resembles his father, having the same hair and eye color. In {{XC3FR|sub}}, Ghondor is an elderly man. His skin is wrinkled and weathered, he sports long white hair that is slicked back with a bun on the back alongside a ponytail. He also has a medium-length goatee. == Story == [[File:noah_ghondor_goodbye.png|thumb|210px|Noah tearfully embracing his son before passing away.]] Ghondor was the child of the last incarnation of the original [[Noah]] and [[Mio]] before they became [[Moebius]]. As his parents were bound by the endless cycle, Ghondor watched as both parents, one after the other, succumbed to passing away due to being at the end of their [[Term]]s. Ghondor would grow and have a family of his own, living by the messages that his parents passed onto him. He was a master of martial arts, training those in the City, namely his grandchildren. He was also a wielder of [[Ouroboros]] as well as an advocate for the powers it granted, a power he was not able to fully utilize. He was killed by his own father, N, during the destruction of the old [[City]]. With his last words, he warned N that M would have only wanted him to let go of his regrets and entrusted Matthew with the power of Ouroboros. == Battle == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Ghondor |image = Ghondor FR Boss.jpg |caption = Ghondor |category = Boss |type = [[Lost Numbers (enemy)|Lost Numbers]] |level = 10 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Hope's Rest]]) |spawntime = Story |respawn = No |movement = Ground |detection = }} Ghondor is a [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3FR|sublink}}. He is fought at level 10 at the gates of the former [[City]] in [[Erythia Sea]] by [[Matthew (FR)|Matthew]] and [[Na'el]] during a flashback at the beginning of ''[[Chapter 2 (FR)|Chapter 2]]''. The battle ends when Ghondor uses Gigantic Beat, which he performs at low health. He cannot be defeated. {{clr}} == Notes == * In the credits of {{XC3FR|sub}}, this character is named as '''Grandfather Ghondor'''. == Trivia == * He shares his name with his distant descendant, [[Ghondor|Ghondor Vandham]] from {{XC3}}. * Like his father and his grandson, Ghondor also sports a ponytail. == Gallery == === {{XC3|-}} === Noah ghondor.png|Noah and Ghondor on the day of Mio's passing. Noahfam.png|Family portrait === {{XC3FR|sub}} === Ghondor martial arts.jpg {{XC3FRCharNav}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3FR Supporting Characters]] [[Category:XC3 Lost Numbers Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Bosses]] [[Category:Citizens]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:Pages needing plot info]]

70 |area = [[Ribbi Flats]] |spawntime = Anytime
During ''[[Men! Of! The Sea! IV]]'' |respawn = Yes
No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Giron Volffs''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Volff]] family, and can be found at level 18-19 in [[Ribbi Flats]] in the [[Fornis Region]]. One is fought at level 70 during the third wave of the [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] ''[[Men! Of! The Sea! IV]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 16-20 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 66-70 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Volffs]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Glaw Camill |image = Glaw Camill.png |caption = Glaw Camill |category = Normal Enemy |type = [[Camill]] |level = 7 |area = [[Yzana Plains]] ([[Colony 9 Front Gate]])
[[Alfeto Valley]] ([[Forward Post Camp]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Glaw Camills''' are minor enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Camill]] family and can be found at level 7 near [[Colony 9 Front Gate]] in [[Yzana Plains]] and near [[Forward Post Camp]] in [[Alfeto Valley]]. ==Drops== *[[Mild Camill Powder]] *[[Well-Aged Camill Juices]] {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Camills]] [[Category:XC3 Level 6-10 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

[[file:Immovable Gonzalez.png|thumb|Immovable Gonzalez in {{XC|-}}]] '''Gogols''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ゴゴール}}, ''Gogōru''; [[English dub pronunciations|English dub]]: {{IPA|/ˈɡoʊɡəl/}}, rhyming with ''ogle'') are an ape-like family in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They are very large and often high level.
Gogols undergo a minor appearance change between games; in {{XC2|-}} and {{TTGC|-}} they have manes instead of the hair spike they had in {{XC|-}}. They also gain slight more life-like anatomy.
{{clr}} == {{XC|-}} == Gogols vary in size and appear on [[Bionis]], in late [[Tephra Cave]], the [[Bionis' Leg]] and [[Satorl Marsh]]. There are three different colors of Gogols: the green/silver, the black, and the red-orange Gogols. The strongest Gogol is [[Reckless Zanden]] in Tephra Cave at level 98.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Baelfael Gogol (XC1)|Baelfael Gogol]] * [[Baelzeb Gogol]] * [[Envy Gogol (XC1)|Envy Gogol]] * [[Gluttony Gogol]] * [[Greed Gogol]] * [[Sloth Gogol (XC1)|Sloth Gogol]] * [[Sonicia Gogol]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Dogmatic Gogol]] (during ''[[Talia's Research]]'' and ''[[Investigating Satorl]]'') * [[Satisfied Gogol]] (during ''[[Securing Provisions]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Erratic Goliante (XC1)|Erratic Goliante]] * [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC1)|Immovable Gonzalez]] * [[Indomitable Daulton]] * [[Territorial Rotbart (XC1)|Territorial Rotbart]]
=== Quest Exclusive Unique Monster === * [[Reckless Zanden]] (during ''[[Battling Brutes]]'')
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Gluttony Gogol]] * [[Sloth Gogol (XC1)|Sloth Gogol]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Contemptuous Greymane]] ([[Fogbeast]])
== {{XC2|-}} == Gogols are found primarily on the [[Upper Level - Right]] area of [[Gormott Province]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Drum Gogol (XC2)|Drum Gogol]] * [[Nose Gogol]] * [[Grad Gogol]] * [[Wendel Gogol]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Imbalanced Gogol]] (DLC, during ''[[Beneath the Aurora]]'') * [[Jealous Gogol]] (DLC, during ''Beneath the Aurora'') * [[Nabadan Gogol]] (during ''[[Concerned Carpenter]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC2)|Immovable Gonzalez]] * [[Territorial Rotbart (XC2)|Territorial Rotbart]]
=== Quest Exclusive Bosses === * [[Enraged Gogol]] (during ''[[Tender-Hearted Beast]]'') * [[Indignant Gogol]] (during ''Tender-Hearted Beast'') * [[Offended Gogol]] (during ''Tender-Hearted Beast'')
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Desco Gogol]] * [[Dyone Gogol]] * [[Immovable Heir Carlos]] * [[Rhogulmaster]] * [[Volffmaster]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == Gogols are found in both [[Gormott (TTGC)|Gormott]] and the [[Kingdom of Torna]], although primarily in the latter. No black Gogols are seen.
=== Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Gobeen Gogol]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Calculating Gogol]] (during ''[[Manning the Gates]]'') * [[Elect Gogol]] (during ''Manning the Gates'') * [[Hewli Gogol]] (during ''[[An Oasis for All]]'') * [[Leract Gogol]] (during ''An Oasis for All'') * [[Preoccupied Gogol]] (during ''[[Lett Bridge Restoration]]'')
=== Unique Monster === * [[Erratic Goliante (TTGC)|Erratic Goliante]]
== {{XC3|-}} == Gogols appear in the world of [[Aionios]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Baelfael Gogol (XC3)|Baelfael Gogol]] * [[Corsaire Gogol]] * [[Drum Gogol (XC3)|Drum Gogol]] * [[Envy Gogol (XC3)|Envy Gogol]] * [[Muskul Gogol]] * [[Sloth Gogol (XC3)|Sloth Gogol]] * [[Submit Gogol]] * [[Wannock Gogol]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Arcaphor Gogol]] (during ''[[Doing It My Way]]'') * [[Giant Gogol]] (during ''[[Knowing Your Family]]'') * [[Staahl Gogol]] (during ''[[Prison Refurbishment]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC3)|Immovable Gonzalez]] * [[Impish Langobard]] * [[Jingoistic Gigantus]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Sloth Gogol (XC3)|Sloth Gogol]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Bombastic Rotbart Jr.]] * [[Sworn Protector Hector]]

{{Infobox quest |name = Going Beyond Power |image = Going_Beyond_Power.jpg |description = "Kyrie got separated from her unit yet again. Bring her back to Colony Gamma." |giver = [[Kyrie]] |location = [[Alfeto Valley]] ([[Volff Lair (XC3)|Volff Lair]]) |time = |prereqs = Departed [[Colony 4]] (Start Chapter 3) |reclevel = Lv. 25 |rewards = 400 [[Colony Gamma]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
940 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
1210 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Teach]] as a [[Hero]] }} '''Going Beyond Power''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Teach]]. The "Scree Walking" [[Traversal Skill]] is unlocked during this quest. == Objectives == # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Keves Army Patrol (6) #** [[Keves Warrior]] (2) #** [[Keves Sniper]] (2) #** [[Keves Blocker]] #** [[Keves Rescuer]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony Gamma]] # ''Gather info from the Colony Gamma soldiers.'' (3) # ''Hold a discussion at a [[Rest Spot (XC3)|rest spot]].'' #* Colony Gamma Lately #** This must be discussed at the [[Gamma Canteen]]. # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Teach]] at the Commander's Office # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Gamma, Back Way]] # ''Head to the "[[Transcendent Retreat|good place]]" Teach mentioned. #* The "Scree Walking" [[Traversal Skill]] is unlocked at this point.'' # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[Teach#Battle|Inscrutable Teach]] #** The battle ends once Teach's HP reaches 50%. # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[G#Battle|Moebius G]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Gamma, Assembly Yard]] == Results == ''"Commander Teach of Colony Gamma has accepted the party's vision of the future and pledged to see it through together with them."'' {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:Teach]] [[Category:Aetia Region Quests]]
